title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a manager in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a manager in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a manager in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, overcoming difficulties and success. This means the dreamer's happiness and success in what he does. In contrast, when the manager is angry and upset, it is true, which means that the dreamers are experiencing loss and failure. There are many people who dream of arguing with a manager or traveling with a manager in their dreams and cannot find a suitable one. I will explain to you the most important interpretation of the dream of seeing a director in a dream. You dream of seeing a director by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing a director in a dream symbolizes wisdom, prudence, diligence, empathy, and logic. Dreaming of a smiling director is a sign of a happy life, psychological comfort, and inner peace. As for seeing a director in a dream, it represents a feeling of loneliness and lack of Dealing with people and dealing with them. Dreaming about managers controlling their dreams is evidence of parental control, whether the father or mother is in the life of the observer. The interpretation that the dreamer cooperated with the director in the dream is evidence of the success of the visionary’s achievement. Seeing the former director in a dream are indicators related to In the past.Dream of seeing a single directorDream spoke to the director in a dignified and polite manner during a woman’s testimony, indicating that she heard a lot of good news in the following period and felt happy.Interpret the dream of marrying the director in a single woman’s dream, explaining that you will get a prestigious job or you will be promoted to A higher position. The dream of a director receiving a generous reward in a woman’s dream proves that she can get what she wants after hard work and long patience. To dream of seeing female directors shaking hands with single people in their dreams is evidence of their engagement and marriage with wealthy people of a higher social status. The director’s love of seeing The dream of an unmarried woman indicates a stable romantic relationship that could end in marriage soon. She dreams of seeing a married woman’s director. Explanation of the director’s vision and his commentary on the dreams of a married woman, evidence of an increase in lawful money, breadth of people’s lives and abundance of blessings. A dream of a married woman, a director who dreams of a dream director indicates , indicates that she will spend happy days with her and her family in the future. In a dream, he gave gifts to a married woman from the manager, which indicates that he will receive a lot of money through inheritance. The married woman’s opinion proved that her husband was working as a manager in her dream, the stability of her family, and the improvement of their relationship With her husband after a period of disagreement. She dreams of seeing the director about a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a happy director’s dream, where a pregnant woman dreams of happiness, the treating physician explains to her that her birth will be an easy matter. The director dreamed of a fashion gift given by a director to a girl, showing that she will give birth to a child. The director’s dream of giving gifts from Men's clothing for a pregnant woman in her dreams means that she will give birth to a woman. Dreaming of a pregnant dream manager is one of the ideal visions that portends the safety and health of unborn children. Dreaming of seeing a man's manager. The interpretation of a person's dream in a dream indicates that he deliberately returned to his memory. To dream that you are arguing With the manager

title: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son by her lover

preview.html: It has very great psychological advantages in a woman's life and we look in our article at the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy from her lover and its effects. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a single boy by her lover There is no doubt that the dream of giving birth to a single child from the person she loves has a good psychological effect on the life of this single woman and has many cases. This dream comes to free people and has a strong tone of joy and happiness that fills their lives and the bright future that awaits them. And the dream of seeing a child born to a single woman from her lover shows the strong family bond in which this girl lives and is reflected in her dreams. When seeing this dream, it predicts that she will have a partner in her life with good morals and beautiful features. While when a single woman sees in a dream childbirth and the pains of children, it shows the facilitation of various issues in her life. And if the newborn is a boy and has bad properties, this indicates that the situation of her husband in the future will not be good after marrying him. This vision is considered the good health that the owner of this dream enjoys despite the poor living conditions in which she lives. The dream of seeing children in a dream shows the rapid change that will occur in this girl's life. And she achieves the goals she is looking for with the utmost comfort. It is considered The dream is comfortable with the pain in the practical life in which you live and the collapse of various problems and difficulties. Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream can indicate the position of the future groom. We have chosen for you: Interpretation of dreams about the birth of a beautiful girl for pregnant women, married women and single women Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a child in a dream of a married woman The dream of the birth of a boy from a beloved to a married woman is not a strange dream for her, she has already lived it, but it has many interpretations, which are: This dream is evidence of the emotional, psychological and family stability that dominates her and her husband. This dream indicates that she maintains the stability of her home and works to raise her children properly. The dream of the birth of a boy from a lover in a newly married woman indicates that she works hard in the marital home on healthy foundations and pillars between her and her husband. Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream expresses the great wealth that this married woman acquires in her professional life. The birth of a child is a wonderful diet and a lot of money comes to the husband without much effort. The dream of giving birth in a dream shows the death of worries, problems and physical exhaustion that this married woman suffers from. The birth of a child in a dream for a married woman from her husband whom she loves says Good news soon, her pregnancy and the passage of her birth easily and smoothly. And the dream of a boy in a dream is evidence of the collapse of problems and sadness from the married home and the emergence of a radical change in her life. Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a boy in a divorced woman’s dream. A separated woman is one of the cases in which she can see the birth of a child from her ex-husband or lover, and each of these dreams has a meaning, and we will look at some of them later. Seeing a divorced woman giving birth to a child from her lover is evidence of the sins that she will commit after her divorce. This vision may indicate a financial struggle and financial burdens that this divorced person cannot bear.

title: Interpretation of seeing red, green and blue rubies in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing rubies in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation: Seeing a dream of rubies in a dream is one of the good visions that heralds well for the dreamer. Seeing rubies in all their colors in a dream also indicates the goodness, joys and happiness that the dreamer may see in his next life. Carrying a ruby ​​in a dream portends With goodness, moving to a new home and a new life for the dreamer’s next life. The orange red stone in a dream indicates happiness and stability. See also: Interpretation of seeing coral reefs in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about red rubies for a single woman. Seeing red rubies in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates marriage to someone who has a lot of Money and status, and God knows best. Seeing a sapphire in a person’s dream promises a lot of money and goodness. Also, seeing a white sapphire in a girl’s dream indicates the purity, religiosity, and good morals that that girl enjoys. Seeing a ring with a green sapphire in it in an unmarried woman’s dream means that Many things will happen that will make her happy, and God knows best. Seeing sapphires in a person’s dream with all their colors is a good sign for her and the emergence of happy things that will change her life for the better, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing precious stones in a dream Interpretation of a dream of rubies in a dream for a married woman Seeing sapphires in a wife’s life means that you She will hear news that makes her happy, and this is if the sapphire is blue. A married woman who sees herself in a dream buying sapphires shows the stability of this woman in her life. Seeing a sapphire necklace of all types and colors in a married woman’s dream indicates a very good and abundant livelihood that the woman will receive in her life. The following, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing yourself wearing a ring in a dream Interpretation of seeing a ruby ​​in a dream for a man It is said that when a married man sees a ruby ​​in his dream, it is a sign that he will have a male child, and God knows best. Seeing one ruby ​​in a dream indicates a close marriage with a beautiful girl Also, seeing a married man giving his wife a ruby ​​or ruby ​​necklace indicates the approaching pregnancy and the possibility of having a child. A man’s vision of blue sapphires shows the abundance and goodness that a person will gain in his life. Dream of a ruby ​​necklace Seeing a ruby ​​necklace in a dream is one of the visions that indicate that The dreamer will receive many benefits and allowances. To see yourself wearing a ruby ​​necklace in a dream shows the king in this world, enjoying and living with many blessings. Seeing necklaces in a dream is one of the visions of women and beneficial marriage and procreation. Seeing a ruby ​​ring in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a ruby ​​ring in The dream is one of the promising visions for the coming of goodness and happiness. Seeing buying a ruby ​​ring in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money and wealth that the dreamer can acquire. Wearing a ruby ​​necklace in a dream is evidence of improved circumstances, and the dreamer obtains high positions and promotion at work. Green sapphire In a dream: Seeing a green sapphire in a dream for an unmarried woman is a sign of the nearness of justice and justice

title: The 20 most important interpretations of seeing a woman praying in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream: Prayer is one of the pillars of religion, one of the pillars of Islam, a means of reaching it and the language of supplication. There is no doubt that seeing prayer in a dream is a good vision, especially if the topic is related to a woman, as it indicates her justice and purity, but there are other cases in which the interpretation may differ, such as praying in the bathroom or without the hijab, which can indicate negative meanings, and in this article we will We refer to all the scholars’ interpretations of the various cases and situations of female prayer in a dream for men and women in general, single women, married people, and others. Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream. There are many different interpretations of seeing a woman praying in a dream, the most important of which are: A woman’s prayer in a divorced woman’s dream portends the death of worries. And problems and a feeling of peace and psychological comfort. Scientists confirm that seeing a woman praying in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good qualities such as honesty, sincerity, and keeping secrets. If the dreamer sees in his dream an old woman praying on a chair, this indicates his interest in work despite the problems and obstacles he faces, and he will reward him. May God promote him and hold him in prestigious positions. Interpretation of seeing a woman praying in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of a dream about a woman praying in a dream the following: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a woman praying in the dreamer’s dream as evidence of preserving her worship, understanding the principles of religion and the correctness of her actions in this world. Ibn Sirin says: Whoever sees a woman praying in a dream, this is good news that worries and problems will go away and positive changes will occur in his life. Seeing a married woman performing the dawn prayer during her sleep is good news for the good of her husband and children. Interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen agrees with Ibn Sirin mentions the positive and auspicious connotations of seeing prayer in general in a dream: Ibn Shaheen interprets seeing prayer in a dream as one of the good visions that foretells good deeds for those who have it in this world and a good ending in the afterlife. Ibn Shaheen says that bowing in a dream is a sign of God’s acceptance of the supplication. And satisfying his desires. Whoever sees that he is performing his prayers and prostrating, it is a sign of his staying away from sin and walking on the straight path instead of darkness and misguidance. If the dreamer sees that he is performing ablution for prayer in a dream, then it is a sign of his purity and chastity and God’s good news of abundant blessings. The belittling supplication in the dream of the unmarried dreamer. An indication of his adherence to the Sunnah of the Noble Messenger of God, and the soundness of his religion, and we wish him a blessed marriage. As for the married man seeing a sign of the birth of his pregnant wife and two male religions. What is the interpretation of seeing prayer in a dream of Imam Al-Nabulsi? Al-Nabulsi did not differ from Ibn Shaheen in his interpretation of the dream of prayer, so we find from his good interpretations the following: Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing prayer in a dream as a sign of The reputation of the viewer and his high status with God. Whoever sees the dawn prayer in a dream and wants to perform it at the specified time, God will help him in his life and complete his affairs well until the end. Friday prayer in a man’s dream is a sign of abundance of food and expansion.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing Ibn Sirin drowning in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing someone drowning in a dream is one of the dreams that everyone is in a hurry to know its interpretations and whether it is a good or bad sign and we will discover in detail all the information below. Seeing someone drowning in a dream Seeing someone drowning in a dream means that his travels will stop for a few days. Whoever dreams of someone he knows drowning in front of him, this means that It indicates financial crises that he will face in the future. Seeing a person drowning in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s distance from God and his preoccupation with worldly pleasures. The dreamer’s vision of a person drowning in a dream symbolizes the problems and disagreements he faces in his marital life and its instability. Seeing a person drowning in a dream is explained by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a person drowning in a dream and returning to the surface again indicates that he will achieve all his goals that he planned in the previous period. If a young man dreams that he is drowning in the future, this means that he will marry the girl he loves in the future. But if the water is in it Impurities, and its color is black, and the dreamer sees himself drowning in it, then this is evidence that he will not get what he wants, but rather it has indications of the problems that he will face in his life. Seeing someone drowning in a dream for single people If an unmarried girl dreams of a man drowning in clear and beautiful water, this indicates Her marriage in the coming period. A girl’s vision shows that she is drowning in the sea, but she is enjoying the underwater view of fish and others, with an abundance of livelihood and money that she will receive. When an unmarried girl sees that she is drowning in a dream and that her brother is saving her, this is a sign that he stands by her side. In difficult situations, he always supports her. Watching a girl drown in the sea that is not related to its high waves in a dream is a sign of the illness or death of one of her family members. If a girl sees that the sea waves are high and someone is drowning, this is a sign that her travel abroad will suffer. Interpret Some scholars see a dreamer seeing someone drowning in a dream as a reflection of the psychological state of an unmarried girl, her tension and fear of something in reality, and she must get rid of this fear in her life so that it does not happen. It has the cause of problems. Seeing someone drowning in a dream for a married woman. The dream of a married woman drowning someone in a dream indicates that Anna is suffering in her married life and faces many problems and crises. The blind woman interpreted the married woman’s vision of a drowning man as advice given to her by one of the wise men around her, and that She listens to him to correct the affairs of her life. A married woman’s dream of someone drowning in a dream and saving him symbolizes that she will receive great provision from God in the coming period. Seeing a married woman drowning in a dream and saving him means that she bears many responsibilities and is fully prepared to fulfill them to the fullest. The woman indicates A married woman who sees someone drowning in a dream indicates that she is neglecting her home and her husband. If a married woman sees that someone is drowning, which is her son, this indicates the imminent death of the boy. When a married woman sees that she and her husband are drowning in a dream, this means that something bad will happen to the entire family. Seeing someone drowning in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman drowning

Seeing a married woman drowning in a dream and saving him means that she bears many responsibilities and is fully prepared to fulfill them to the fullest. The woman indicates A married woman who sees someone drowning in a dream indicates that she is neglecting her home and her husband. If a married woman sees that someone is drowning, which is her son, this indicates the imminent death of the boy. When a married woman sees that she and her husband are drowning in a dream, this means that something bad will happen to the entire family. Seeing someone drowning in a dream about a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman drowning

title: Learn about the most important interpretations of a hurricane in a dream

preview.html: A tornado in a dream is one of the things that many people have always wondered about. It is one of the things that is difficult to control or control easily. In addition, it causes a lot of fears among dreamers and makes them worried about the meaning of seeing that in a dream symbolizing... especially black. A tornado in a dream. A tornado is one of Those things that indicate the nature of people more than their circumstances. If the dreamer sees the big tornado recurring in his dream, this symbolizes the presence of many different thoughts and feelings in his head, which he cannot handle easily. With or control before eliminating it. While the woman who sees in her dream the terrifying tornado blowing and wakes up resolutely and without fear, this vision shows that she has acquired many special things in her life. A young man who dreams that he is fighting a tornado, this vision symbolizes the presence of many things that require him to fight And the face until it reaches its final destination and triumphs over everything that disappoints it or destroys its morale. The hurricane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a hurricane in the dreams of many dreamers as a sign of the emergence of many changes and changes in the dreamer’s life, and it does not matter whether these changes are Did it happen to him by his own hand, or were they just things imposed on him? . In the end the result is the same. Likewise, a woman who sees in her dream that a tornado is hitting everything around her and making a terrifying sound, her vision suggests that she is suspicious of many people and things that have been happening around her recently, causing the frustration that she has been exposed to. After discovering the betrayal of the closest people in her life. Interpretation of a dream Asrar is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Hurricane in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq interpreted seeing a hurricane in a dream with many things related to the dreamer’s soul. And his ability to resist in order to survive. We find that the first vision of a tornado during her sleep is a sign for her of the pressures and orders that she must take in her life without any objection from her. While the young man who sees the tornado in his dream, his vision shows that he will face many problems with his family and everyone around him to prove his point of view and his ability to achieve his dreams. Which everyone thinks is fair. Illusions and delusions that have no place except in his mind. The tornado in Nabulsi’s dream. Nabulsi’s interpretation of the tornado shows that many strange and subtle things happened to the dreamer in his life, which he did not expect at all and he always wanted to change at least one thing in his normal daily life. While the girl Whoever sees in her dream a hurricane accompanied by heavy rain indicates that she will face many difficulties and problems in her life, especially with her family, which suffers from the lack of a common language for dialogue with them, which increases it. . Disagreements, but what he saw foretells that she will change many of her behaviors, and will overcome her negative feelings and improve her relationship with them soon. title: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a rooster in a dream for a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a rooster in a dream According to what was stated by many religious and interpretive scholars, seeing a rooster in a dream has many different interpretations and interpretations, which depend largely on the color of the religion in the dream and also on the condition of the dreamer. Scholars who believe that the rooster represents the victory of good over evil. Also, the rooster does not crow in real life, unless the string sees my point in the morning light, and with the darkness of the night it falls to the ground and strikes. In his death, some believe that seeing a rooster is evidence of stubbornness and adventure, and then we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of seeing a rooster in a dream. The interpretation of the dream of seeing a rooster in a dream for a single woman. Many questions about the interpretation of dreams about seeing a rooster in a dream. Through the following paragraph we will give you the interpretation of the dream of seeing a rooster in a dream for a single girl. , which came as follows: If an unmarried girl sees a rooster in a dream, this vision indicates her purity in addition to her good reputation among people. It is worth noting that seeing a rooster in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates distinguished guests from high ranks and homes who will visit this girl and her family. In her home. If an unmarried girl sees during her sleep a rooster lying on her bed, then this vision represents a paid ticket to the girl’s marriage and her engagement trip. It will be a beautiful trip that will be taken as an example of relationships and a reference for happiness between the two partners. The rooster represents a person with a high social and financial status, and God knows the unseen. Watch. Also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an open grave in a dream for a single, married, and pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rooster in a dream for a married woman. There are many meanings and interpretations that arise when a married woman sees a rooster in a dream, and through the following paragraph we will learn about the interpretation of this vision for a married woman as follows: Next: If a married woman sees a white rooster in a dream, this vision indicates that her children are good and obedient to her, and this vision indicates that her children are good people who have a bright and brilliant future in the coming days and years. And if a married woman sees a peaceful rooster in her dream lying on her husband’s bed This vision shows her husband’s love for her and his attachment to her to the utmost extent. See also: Interpretation of a dream about praying in the mosque in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and what it indicates. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rooster in a dream for a pregnant woman. After we have presented to you many different interpretations and meanings that arose in Regarding seeing an unmarried girl married to a rooster, we will give you in the following paragraph the interpretation of a dream about seeing blood in a dream for a pregnant woman. It follows: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream her transformation into a rooster, then this vision is a metaphor for the birth of a male child, and this newborn will be free of any evil or defect, God willing. It is worth noting that if a rooster pecks a pregnant woman in her dream, then this vision is a sign and indication of the necessity of The woman follows up with her obstetrician and gynecologist to reassure her fetus. Beware. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a rooster in a dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about my husband Ali getting married and his wife being pregnant in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams for my husband: Ali got married and his wife is pregnant. The husband’s marriage to another woman is one of the things that raises anxiety and fear in the hearts of women that this will happen due to intense jealousy over their husbands. What indicates good and sometimes can indicate bad, and in this article we will explain the explanations in detail. Follow along with us. Interpretation of dreams for my husband, Ali, getting married and his wife being pregnant. The interpretation of my husband’s dream about Ali getting married and his wife being pregnant indicates that the wise woman and her husband will receive many blessings and good deeds in the coming period. Vision A married dreamer gets her husband married in a dream and in reality she suffered from some problems and obstacles in her life. This is one of her good visions because she may be able to get rid of these crises in the coming days. I dreamed that my husband married Ali and that his wife is pregnant. This indicates that this man got A lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about my husband, Ali, and his pregnant wife, Ibn Shireen. Many scholars, jurists, and dream interpreters spoke about visions of a woman who married another woman and became pregnant from him in a dream, and among them is the scholar Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin interprets my husband’s dream that Ali is married and his wife is pregnant as evidence of the rise of the dreamer in Her professional position. Seeing a married woman marrying her life partner with a girl who has attractive features in a dream, this indicates that she will get a lot of money and God Almighty will expand her livelihood with the beauty of the girl she saw. Interpretation of a dream about my husband Ali getting married and his wife is pregnant and I am pregnant. If the pregnant woman sees that her husband is marrying her in In a dream, this indicates that she is in a bad psychological state. If a pregnant dreamer sees her husband marrying a woman with bad traits, this may mean that she will encounter many problems and obstacles and her health will deteriorate due to pregnancy, so she should be careful. If a pregnant woman sees that her husband is marrying her and becoming pregnant, His new wife from him in her dream, this may be a sign of their rise together in their social status and professional position. Interpretation of a dream about my husband getting married to Ali and having a son and two girls. Interpretation of a dream about my husband Ali being married and having a boy and a girl and this indicates a feeling of discomfort and psychological stability for the visionary husband. If the married dreamer sees that Her marriage to her life partner and in her dream she gave birth to a boy and a girl, this indicates the presence of many problems in their lives and the emergence of heated discussions between them and his inability to reveal what. He feels it...Interpretation of a dream about my husband, Ali, getting married and having children. Interpretation of dreams about my husband, Ali, getting married and giving birth to a son. This indicates that the fortuneteller’s husband will get a lot of money because he owns a lot of property. If a married woman sees that her husband gets married and gives birth to a son in a dream, this means that he will obtain a high position in his work and raise his professional position. The vision of a married fortuneteller that the husband has A child from the woman he married in a dream indicates that God Almighty will give her a child. Seeing a married woman marrying another woman in a dream and she was facing many obstacles and difficulties in her life, and this vision promises her that she will be able to get rid of all of that with the help of her husband. Interpretation My husband's dream is that he gets married and has a daughter that speaks many things

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream from Ibn Sirin, seeing an easy exam in a dream, and the dream interpretation of a difficult exam.

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an examination: As the wise men used to say: “On the day of examination, a man is honored or humiliated,” as the fate of many people changes and through it many goals and aspirations are fulfilled, and at the same time, many wishes and dreams. Destroyed, so what does it mean to see exams in a dream? It carries with it some connotations and meanings for the dreamer, especially if he loses the ability to make the right decision during this period, so let us learn together more interpretations about seeing exams in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an exam in a dream by Ibn SirinMany scholars, including Ibn Sirin, indicate, Until seeing an exam in a dream is evidence of evil or falling into misfortune, and therefore his degree of faith and closeness to the Creator - the Almighty - is at stake. He feels confused and unable to make the right decision in this situation. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a difficult exam. If he sees that the test is difficult and he cannot pass it or write any information on it, then this is an indication of his illness and his feeling of fear and inability to pass it or write any information on it. He endured the pain, and if his income was limited then so be it. An indication of the difficulty of living and the lack of finding another source of income that allows him to overcome this situation and can provide the basic requirements for him and his family. Seeing an easy exam in a dream On the contrary, if the exam is seen and easy to pass, even to achieve success and excellence, then it indicates achieving the dream of wealth Or the ability to overcome the crises that he faces, whether they are financial or related to work or study, and if he sees that he is late for the test date, it is a sign of a distracted mind and carrying out multiple tasks at the same time that makes him unable to achieve the goals in his life. Interpretation of the vision of exams for a single and married man when A single man sees that he shows up to the examination board and is able to solve all the questions and leaves before the date ends, then this is a sign that he finds the right life partner for him who will make him move forward and achieve success in his work. And rising in the ranks of work, and if it is already connected, then it is an indication of marriage to a girl who comes from a good family. Interpretation of an exam in a dream: If a person is married, it may mean that he faces some problems with his wife due to the difference in nature between them, which creates a gap in terms of the cultural and social level between them, Success in the test is also an indicator of living a happy and stable life with the other party and the ability to achieve goals and build a better future for children. Sources: - 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad bin Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Dream Interpretation , Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.

Interpretation of the vision of exams for a single and married man when A single man sees that he shows up to the examination board and is able to solve all the questions and leaves before the date ends, then this is a sign that he finds the right life partner for him who will make him move forward and achieve success in his work. And rising in the ranks of work, and if it is already connected, then it is an indication of marriage to a girl who comes from a good family. Interpretation of an exam in a dream: If a person is married, it may mean that he faces some problems with his wife due to the difference in nature between them, which creates a gap in terms of the cultural and social level between them, Success in the test is also an indicator of living a happy and stable life with the other party and the ability to achieve goals and build a better future for children. Sources: - 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad bin Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Dream Interpretation , Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008.
